description:
An image viewer that allows you to browse images in folders and compressed files like a book.
Powerful customization is available.


(2025-04-05)
This is the official version of NeeView 43.0.
Main changes
- System: Changed to .NET 9 based.
- System: Implemented welcome dialog.
- Language: Korean added.
- History: Added the ability to display date/time groups in the history panel.
- Panels: Compressed file icons and media file icons added to folder icons in PageList and Playlist.
- :
